info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:51PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HARDIN COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM CDT... At 651 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saratoga, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saratoga, Batson, and Honey Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
